steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fqdo0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7v8i3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5mfr2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":136,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"4auiv","text":"NOTE: Depending on the initial concentration of cDNA amplicon that was used as the input, the number of cycles for index PCR WILL vary. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":87,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"aq6jm","text":"Aim for at least 100-200 ng of input cDNA amplicon in 30ul as recommended by Illumina. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"aaimq","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":88,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"9inv5","text":"If the input cDNA is around 100-200 ng, the index PCR cycle has to be set at 7/8 cycles.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"93ffv","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":94,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"99qvp","text":"If the cDNA amplicon input is from 25-99 ng, the index PCR cycle has to be set at 9/10 cycles.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
